attributes.action: Compensation for women born in 1950s, due to state pension age change
attributes.additional_details: Born in England 1955. Have worked hard all my life not knowing another 6 years would be added to pensionable age.
attributes.background: Have worked since I was 16 and planned for my retirement at 60. Due to unfair government changes I will not get state pension until I am 66.
